name: .XPD File Extension
summary: Learn about .XPD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: An XPD file is a license file downloaded alongside Sony PlayStation Store content. It is used for Digital Rights Management (DRM) and is required to transfer games and other downloaded files to a PlayStation Portable (PSP).

content: XPD files are acquired by the PlayStation Network Downloader (PSND) when downloading files from the PlayStation Store for PSP.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
